divs: Sighting Detailsi was out smokin a cigerette on the stairs in my back yard, and i walk down do somethin then when i was done, i started to waslk back up and right when i started to sit down i seen somethin in the corner of my eye, when i looked up and saw it for a split second it took off really fast, it was silent dont rmemeber the shape of it couse it was so fast but it was within 300 feet from me just hovering in the air not making one noise. after words i was thinking it could of been the governement but then i thought no why would the governemnet want to do that, then again why would extraterrestrials want to i dont know, maybe because ive always wanted to see one and they new it, ive had dreams with them in it, and they just wanted to show me their infact real, couse i belived in them but then i had doubts couse i never seen one before. and ever since then i seen like 4 other ones, but they were much far away it was dark out and they all appeared out of nowhere and dissapeard again(their bright lights lit up the craft) then it would disapear again like going threw dimensions or somethin.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Glenwood
There were no other sightings in Glenwood on or around March 18th 2008
